title: [Alpha client bug] Can't select my resolution
body:
My display is 1600x900, but in League Alpha Client it only have 1024x768 and 1280x720. 

Is there a way to add 1600x900 resolution? Window is too damn small

http://i.imgur.com/Jwyvzrg.png

replies.body: Like if its 150% change it to like 125% or something
Try changing your windows scaling to like  a lower one
